what specific regulations or policies are currently in place to protect personal information online?</s> 
as an ai language model, i do not have access to real-time updates regarding the current policies and regulations for protecting personal information online. however, some general regulations that aim to safeguard people's data include the general data protection regulation (gdpr) in europe and the california consumer privacy act (ccpa) in the united states. these laws require companies to obtain users' consent before collecting their personal data and provide consumers with rights regarding how their information is used, stored, and shared. additionally, many social media platforms have implemented various privacy settings and tools to help users control who has access to their data and what information they can share publicly.<|endoftext|>
